ygData.subject: RE: JM, shed some light? Bard magnets .....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, first time I saw this I thought it was a GM playing games with us.  But I ve seen it enough to figure it s either a bug (distance checks getting
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 26 Jul 1999, Michael W. Steele wrote:
>
> In EK pulling crags a few lions decided to play too. No
> biggie, just kill'em after the crag. No sooner than this
> happens, a few more lions pop over the mountain beelining
> for our party. WTF is this we say? It's kinda funny at the

Yes, first time I saw this I thought it was a GM playing games
with us. But I've seen it enough to figure it's either a bug
(distance checks getting screwed up and all mobs suddenly know
that you're fighting their friends), or a feature (some kind
of social zone frenzy).

> to find a crag. He calls a train and I am getting ready to
> derail it with Lullaby while he picks up the other songs
> (Is it me or does lullaby have a LONG pulse? I am scared

I've been noticing something similar, except with Psalm of
Warmth. When I'm weaving 4 songs, usually the current song
icon disappears a second or two before it reappears. But
sometimes I manage to get all 4 going at once. When this
happens, it's almost always PoW that I'm singing. I'll have
to time it (next month, need to catch up on work :-) but I
suppose it's possible that certain songs take longer or
shorter to start up.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
